contentrichtext.text: {{about|the municipality|the district|Vaala, Turku}} {{Infobox Finnish Municipality |name = Vaala |official_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = Municipality |motto = |image_skyline = Vaalankurkku railway bridge.jpg |imagesize = |image_caption = Mist rising from Oulujoki river in Vaala |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = Vaala.vaakuna.svg |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = Vaala.sijainti.suomi.2008.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location of Vaala in [[Finland]] |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = <!-- name of a location map as per Template:Location_map --> |pushpin_label_position = <!-- position of the pushpin label: left, right, top, bottom, none --> |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |region = [[Kainuu]] |subregion = Kajaani sub-region |leader_title = Municipality manager |leader_name = [[Tytti Seppänen]] |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |leader_title2 = |leader_name2 = |leader_title3 = |leader_name3 = |established_title = [[Charter]] |established_date = 1954 |established_title2 = |established_date2 = |established_title3 = |established_date3 = |extinct_title = |extinct_date = |area_urban_km2 = |area_metro_km2 = |population_metro = |population_blank1_title = |population_blank1 = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_urban = |population_density_urban_km2 = |population_note = |finnish_official = |swedish_official = |sami_official = |urbanisation = 40.9 |unemployment = 20.6 |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |blank2_name = |blank2_info = |coordinates_display = |coordinates_type = |latd= 64 |latm= 33 |lats= |latNS=N |longd= 026 |longm= 50 |longs= |longEW=E |elevation_m = |postal_code = |website = [http://www.vaala.fi/ www.vaala.fi] |footnotes = }} '''Vaala''' is a municipality in [[Finland]]. It is located in the [[Kainuu]] [[regions of Finland|region]]. Established in 1954 (predecessor municipality Säräisniemi, established in 1867), the municipality has a population of {{formatnum: {{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|Vaala}}}} ({{#time: j F Y|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population count|sourcedate}} }})<ref name="population_count" /> and covers an area of {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/total area|Vaala}}|km2}} of which {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/waters area|Vaala}}|km2|abbr=on}} is water.<ref name="total_area" /> The [[population density]] is {{convert|{{Infobox Finnish Municipality/population density|Vaala|round=2}}|PD/km2}}. [[Oulujärvi]], the fourth largest lake of Finland is located partly in Vaala. The municipality is unilingually [[Finnish language|Finnish]]. Vaala is also an old Finnish word, which means the phase in a river just before rapids. ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{commonscat-inline|Vaala}} * [http://www.vaala.fi/ Municipality of Vaala] – Official website {{Kainuu}} [[Category:Vaala| ]] [[Category:Municipalities of Kainuu Region]] {{OuluProvince-geo-stub}}
